title: Statement from First Lady Melania Trump on Barbara Bush – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
April 21, 2018
Today the world paid tribute to a woman of indisputable character and grace.  It was my honor to travel to Houston to give my respects to Barbara Bush and the remarkable life she led as a mother, wife, and fearless First Lady.  My sincerest thoughts and prayers continue to be with George H.W., and the entire Bush family.
